summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of land and other property for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 41st Avenue Northeast from the north line of Hawthorne Home Addition No. 1 to the south line of East 65th Street, and of East 62nd Street from 40th Avenue Northeast to 43rd Avenue Northeast; providing for the necessary slopes for cuts or fills upon the property abutting on said portions of said streets; and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment on the property specially benefited.
